oral_questioning.name: Oral Questioning (OQ)
oral_questioning.description: Oral Questioning assessments allow candidates to demonstrate their understanding of concepts through verbal responses, focusing on the practical application of hydroponics and urban farming.

evidence.LO1: Candidates will explain standard operating procedures for farming activities and equipment operations.
evidence.LO2: Candidates will discuss regulations, WSH practices, and housekeeping rules relevant to farming operations.

submission: Candidates will verbally respond to assessors during a structured questioning session.
oral_questioning.retention_period: All oral questioning recordings and assessment notes will be retained for 2 years for compliance and auditing.
